pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-5500
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I7-7700
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE 2070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
